problems.title: Reverse a String
problems.description:
Reverse the given string and print it.

Input Format:
First line contains a string.

Output Format:
Print the reversed string.
problems.examples:
Sample Input
Hello

Sample Output
olleH

Explanation:
Reversed "Hello" becomes "olleH"
hintsList: Use two pointers: start from the beginning and end, swap characters. Or create a new string by reading characters from the end.
